root.name: Teacher’s Pet
root.description: Teacher's Pet is a pinball game launched in December 1965. It was created by Williams Electronic Manufacturing Company, commonly know as just Williams, who had a production run of 1600 units. The aim of the game was to light up the letters in the words Teachers's Pet on the backglass. Each letter lit gave bonus points. The table featured 2 flippers, 3 pop bumpers, 4 kick out holes, and 2 drop targets.
